featured.text: If the research proves successful in humans, some of the nearly 40 million blind people worldwide may one day have a tiny, striped fish to thank. 43.

definition.zh_def: 有條紋的，通常指衣物或物體表面有平行的顏色或圖案。
definition.en_def: Having stripes; marked with long, narrow bands of color.
definition.example: She wore a striped shirt that made her stand out in the crowd.
